description: This file contains CSS for theme management and styling for the App component of the tic-tac-toe project, implementing both light and dark themes as well as responsive design features.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, styled with theme-dependent colors and responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component styled to display in the center with adaptable background colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button component for toggling between light and dark themes, designed with user interaction effects.
